title: DQ-LoRe: Dual Queries with Low Rank Approximation Re-ranking for In-Context Learning. (arXiv:2310.02954v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Recent advances in natural language processing, primarily propelled by Large Language Models (LLMs), have showcased their remarkable capabilities grounded in in-context learning. A promising avenue for guiding LLMs in intricate reasoning tasks involves the utilization of intermediate reasoning steps within the Chain-of-Thought (CoT) paradigm. Nevertheless, the central challenge lies in the effective selection of exemplars for facilitating in-context learning. In this study, we introduce a framework that leverages Dual Queries and Low-rank approximation Re-ranking (DQ-LoRe) to automatically select exemplars for in-context learning. translated_title: DQ-LoRe: 用于上下文学习的低秩近似双重查询重新排序
translated_abstract: 最近自然语言处理领域的新进展，主要是由大型语言模型（LLMs）推动的，展示了它们在上下文学习方面的显著能力。在复杂推理任务中引导LLMs的一个有前途的途径是利用链式思维（CoT）范式中的中间推理步骤。然而，最主要的挑战在于有效地选择示例来促进上下文学习。在这项研究中，我们引入了一个框架，利用双重查询和低秩近似重新排序（DQ-LoRe）来自动选择用于上下文学习的示例。双重查询首先查询LLM以获取LLM生成的知识，例如CoT，然后通过问题和知识查询检索器以获取最终的示例。此外，对于第二个查询，LoRe利用降维技术来改进示例选择，确保与输入问题的知识密切对齐。通过广泛的实验验证了DQ-LoRe框架的有效性和性能。
tldr: 本研究引入了DQ-LoRe框架，它通过双重查询和低秩近似重新排序自动选择用于上下文学习的示例，在复杂推理任务中展示了出色的性能和效果。
en_tdlr: This study introduces the DQ-LoRe framework, which automatically selects exemplars for in-context learning through dual queries and low-rank approximation re-ranking, showcasing excellent performance and effectiveness in complex reasoning tasks.
